entry.tran: 硬木（如橡木、柚木、红木等）
entry.def: Hardwood is wood such as oak, teak, and mahogany, which is very strong and hard.

means.word_mean: 1. the wood of broad-leaved dicotyledonous trees (as distinguished from the wood of conifers)
1. made of the hard-to-cut wood of a broad-leaved tree, as e.g. oak;
